doc:
Sidney Toler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sidney_Toler 0 Sidney Toler (born Hooper G. Toler Jr., April 28, 1874 – February 12, 1947) was an American actor, playwright and theatre director. The second European-American actor to play the role of Charlie Chan on screen, he is best remembered for his portrayal of the Chinese-American detective in 22 films made between 1938 and 1946. Before becoming Chan, Toler played supporting roles in 50 motion pictures and was a highly regarded comic actor on the Broadway stage. Sidney_Toler ( born Hooper_G._Toler_Jr. , April_28_,_1874 – February_12_,_1947 ) was an_American_actor_,_playwright_and_theatre_director . The_second_European-American_actor to_play the_role of Charlie_Chan on screen , he is_best_remembered for his_portrayal of the_Chinese-American_detective in 22_films made between 1938_and_1946 . Before becoming Chan , Toler played_supporting roles in 50_motion_pictures and was a_highly_regarded_comic_actor on the_Broadway_stage .
